title: Got the league client installed but currently can't update the initial update
body: Just says unknown error, wondering what happened :c

replies.body: This could be a network problem that's struggling to reach the patching server, so it can't update.  Start off with each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
